entry.def: A mountainside is one of the steep sides of a mountain.

example.ex: The couple trudged up the dark mountainside.
example.tran: 这对夫妇在黑黝黝的山坡上艰难跋涉。

means.word_mean: 1. the side or slope of a mountain;

sentences.en: They walked a quarter of a mile down the mountainside.

sentences.cn: 一座古塔阴森森地矗立在山腰上。
